summary: Project now involves an app deployment workflow: moving draft versions to live for sharing, with interest in eventual App Market publishing.
architectural_notes: Versioning model includes draft vs live versions; deployment promotes a draft to live without changing the URL.

existing_features.title: Promote the currently deployed draft version of the app to the live version so that the live app URL serves the latest draft build.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a "Push Draft to Live" deployment action to promote the current draft version to live at the same URL.
Add support for publishing apps to an App Market (formal marketplace publishing), beyond sharing live app links.

projectName: Promote current draft deployment to live
